name: Angel and Watch
description:
Built for a university assignment in 2 weeks. 

To play:

  • Use the arrow keys to move left and right
  • Use the left mouse click to shoot
  • You can reset the game any time with the space key

Credits, in alphabetical order: 

  • Robin Ahlgren - Sound design, Game design
  • Elina Peyda - Visual art, Game design
  • Dani-Alys Rizal - Product owner, Game design, programming
